::Koj::
Koj takes the mike and starts out slow "Did you know I am a pioneer I'm out 
on a secret mission I travel to the stars and far beyond." As he starts out 
not sounding to bad but rather good. Koj suddenly picks up the pace starts 
to play the guitar. "Can't you see that I am a pioneer unlocking the 
greatest mysteries my key is a fearless heart so pure and strong. People 
laugh when you are a pioneer not walking the straight and narrow they tell 
you way things are they swear your wrong." As Koj does this he picks up his 
guitar speed causeing the hull of the Cf to shake as the music echos through 
out all the halls and even onto the bridge.


::Lilly::
"Because you cannot be a hero hiding underneath your bed. You got to live 
the life you create inside your head." As a beautiful female voice rangs 
out."So I opened window caught wind one night and now I sail with the birds 
in the sky.

::Koj::
"If your tired of everything come here to take a ride with me you'll cry out 
with joy when you realize your dreams its a trip like no other for your 
heart and mind leaving all but the future far behind." Koj contines to play 
the guitar and starts to up the speed and the sound gets better.

::Lilly::
"But Koj sometimes I think I'm safer here?"

::Koj::
"Never mind that be a pioneer. O Lilly can't you see that you are a pioneer 
not one of the endless talkers who tell you the same old rules you've heard 
before you are a pioneer the same as me." Koj gives it all he's got and goes 
all out for one more solo.

::Lilly::
"Hand in hand we will journey as pioneers an won't listen those who say that 
we are wrong.We will be Pioneers forever more"

::Both Koj & Lilly::
"Some will say we are saver here. Nevermind them we are pioneers. "O"  
Through the ages we will be Pioneers. We go on a secret mission hand in hand 
we will travel to the stars and far beyond. We will be pioneers forever 
more." As Koj comes to a stop and smiles. ((Thank you Thank you and people 
say maximals never have fun. Yan yell at me later G-night.))
